name: Floppy Cat Saves the World
description:
Tap and drag floppy cat to fling it around.  Reach the end of the level and destroy the psychophants in your way!

This title is unfinished but playable.  Some levels have little content (the last one).

Known Bugs: 

  • Level 3's hitbox for the finish line is a bit big.
  • Sometimes when clicking and dragging multiple times, the player can get stuck in slow motion.
